classification.task_goal: Provide R code to predict survival time for patients in an oncology clinical trial considering specific factors.
primary_constraints: Include baseline characteristics like age and gender in the R code.
Account for time-varying death hazard using a piecewise model in the R code.
Perform 10000 simulations to estimate average time of death in the R code.
Incorporate hazard of censoring in the R code.
classification.reasoning: The assistant consistently provided R code that adhered to the user's constraints throughout the conversation without any violations.
